price: 86. And We admitted them to Our Mercy. Verily, they were of the righteous.
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wa-adkhalnāhum fī raḥmatinā innahum mina al-ṣāliḥīna
